PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-07892024-06-21NRCAN
ActNuclear Safety and Control Act
PrecisAppointment of PIERRE TREMBLAY of Whitby, Ontario, to be a full-time permanent member of the Canadian Nuclear Safety Commission, to hold office during good behaviour for a term of five years; and his designation as President of the Canadian Nuclear Safety Commission, effective August 12, 2024.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Appointment of PIERRE TREMBLAY of Whitby, Ontario, to be a full-time permanent member of the Canadian Nuclear Safety Commission, to hold office during good behaviour for a term of five years; and his designation as President of the Canadian Nuclear Safety Commission, effective August 12, 2024.
